mapper.select: select x.id, x.username, case when sum(g.score) is null then 0 else sum(g.score) end as total from ( select distinct u.id, u.username from "user" u join user_group ug on u.id = ug.user_id and u.valid and ug.valid join assignment_group ag on ag.group_id = ug.group_id and ag.valid and ug.valid join assignment a on ag.assignment_id = a.id and a.id = #{aid}) x left join grade g on x.id = g.user_id and g.valid group by x.id, x.username;
